testcase.classname: US001 Validation Of Logo And Dropdown
testcase.name: TC01 <--> User Validates Movita Logo
testcase.system-out: Given Go to "movita" page...................................................passed When Hover the Movita Logo with mouse.......................................passed And Click with mouse........................................................passed And Hover the Dropdown Section..............................................passed When Click to Dropdown and select “Türkçe” option...........................passed Then Click to Dropdown and select “English” option..........................passed

testcase.name: TC02 <--> User validates "ROTA OPTIMIZASYONU" sub component
testcase.system-out: Given Go to "movita" page...................................................passed And validates ROTA OPTIMIZASYONU component..................................passed Given hover on ROTA OPTIMIZASYONU...........................................passed
